oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Admiral Benbow Inn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Admiral Benbow Inn – Memphis, Tenn. 134 Rooms” Color image of exterior with inset of pool.

“Admiral Benbow Inn -- 1220 Union Ave. – Memphis, Tenn. -- 134 Deluxe Rooms -- Phone Broadway 4-0633 -- TWX Code ME-238 -- Individually Controlled Air Conditioning and Heating Thermostats – Swimming Pool – TV – Direct Dialing Phones in each room – Radio and Background Music – Cocktail Lounge – 2 Dining Rooms – Conference Room”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Admiral Benbow Inn; hotels; Union Avenue;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: W. R. Marion – 1716 N. Shore Terr. – Orlando, Fla.
